wobani.rendering

Class RenderingPipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.rendering.RenderingPipeline

  • public class RenderingPipeline
extends java.lang.Object
    Renders the scene with the specified renderers. In the Geometry Stage you can render the scene in different ways like Blinn-Phong shading, toon shading, shadow mapping etc. In the Screen Space Stage you can perform post processing effects or draw UI elements.

      static void useBlinnPhongPipeline()
      Sets the rendering pipeline to use the Blinn-Phong shading for rendering meshes, draw the splines with a single color, create shadow map and some post processing effects.

    • Field Detail

      • SHADOWMAP

        public static final ParameterKey<Texture2D> SHADOWMAP
        Shadowmap key.

      • WORK

        public static final ParameterKey<Texture2D> WORK
        Working frame's key. After the scene stage you can reach here the actual work in progress version of the current frame (and the final, displayed texture at the end of the rendering).

      • SHADOW_PROJECTION_VIEW_MATRIX

      • getParameters

        @NotNull
public static ParameterContainer getParameters()

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes the RenderingPipeline. You should call this method before using it. However the GameLoop's initialize methods call it.

      • getRenderingScale

        public static float getRenderingScale()
        Returns the rendering scale. It scales up or down the size of the window's client area.
        Returns:
        rendering scale

      • setRenderingScale

        public static void setRenderingScale(float renderingScale)
        Sets the rendering scale to the given value. It scales up or down the size of the window's client area.
        Parameters:
        renderingScale - rendering scale
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - rendering scale must be higher than 0

      • getRenderingSize

        @NotNull
 @ReadOnly
public static org.joml.Vector2i getRenderingSize()
        Returns the pipeline's rendering size. It depends on the window's client area and the rendering scale.
        Returns:
        the pipeline's rendering size

public static void useBlinnPhongPipeline()
